title: RIOT Job Requirements please help
body:
I am a High School student and I am very interested in becoming a Systems Game Designer but on the website, it does not specify what the pre-requisites (such as College Degrees or past work experience) are to get the desired job. I was curious if anyone could help me find out the information on the pre-requisites or if they could guide me to where I could find out myself.

Thank you!
